articles.title: Haris Rauf on India-Pakistan at the T20 World Cup: 'I'm very happy because it is at the MCG' - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Fast bowler is hoping his experience playing for Melbourne Stars in the BBL helps him when Pakistan take on India at the T20 World Cup
articles.content: Haris Rauf produced figures of 4-0-25-1, accounting for Hardik Pandya, in the India-Pakistan 2021 T20 World Cup game  •  AFP/Getty Images
